title: DDFP 355: Best QBs, Letterman & 'Mad Men'
itunes:title: DDFP 355: Best QBs, Letterman & 'Mad Men'
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Elliot Harrison to review NFL.com's recent top quarterback lists debating the league's best signal caller. Plus, Shek gives his tribute to David Letterman before the guys review the final episodes of "Mad Men" (57:30). Lastly, a "shout out" from producer Black Tie. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
